Title: aiXiv: A Next-Generation Open Access Ecosystem for Scientific Discovery Generated by AI Scientists
Abstract: Introduces aiXiv, an open-access platform where AI and human scientists collaboratively generate, review, and publish scientific research using multi-agent systems.
Subject: Artificial Intelligence, Open Access, Scientific Discovery

Title: Machine Learning Testing: Survey, Landscape, and Horizons
Abstract: Comprehensive survey on testing methodologies and challenges for machine learning
Subject: ML Testing, Software Engineering

Title: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
Abstract: Reviews AI and ML concepts, evolution, and future research prospects.
Subject: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning

Title: AI in Data Privacy and Security
Abstract: This paper surveys the role of artificial intelligence in enhancing data privacy and security, covering techniques such as federated learning, differential privacy, and secure computation.
Subject: AI Security, Data Privacy, Cybersecurity

Title: A Living Review of AI/ML Applications in Accelerator Physics
Abstract: A continuously updated review summarizing applications of AI and machine learning in accelerator physics, including beam optimization, diagnostics, and control systems.
Subject: Accelerator Physics, AI/ML Applications

Title: On Verification in Open RAN
Abstract: This work analyzes verification challenges in Open Radio Access Networks (Open RAN), focusing on reliability, security, and AI-driven network management.
Subject: Open RAN, Network Verification

Title: Measuring the Impact of Early-2025 AI on Experienced Open-Source Developer Productivity
Abstract: An empirical study evaluating how early-2025 AI tools affect productivity, code quality, and workflow efficiency of experienced open-source developers.
Subject: Developer Productivity, AI Tools

Title: AI Research Agents for Machine Learning Search, Exploration, and Generalization in MLE-Bench
Abstract: Introduces AI research agents designed to automate machine learning search, exploration, and generalization tasks evaluated on the MLE-Bench benchmark.
Subject: AI Agents, Machine Learning Research

Title: Machine Learning Testing: Survey, Landscape, and Horizons
Abstract: A comprehensive survey on testing machine learning systems, covering current methodologies, tools, challenges, and future research directions.
Subject: ML Testing, Software Engineering

Title: Integrating Explainable AI for Energy-Efficient Open Radio Access Networks
Abstract: This paper explores integrating explainable AI techniques into Open RAN architectures to improve energy efficiency while maintaining transparency.
Subject: Explainable AI, Open RAN, Energy Efficiency

Title: Explainable AI Models for Transparent and Trustworthy Decision Support Systems
Abstract: Reviews explainable AI models designed to enhance transparency, interpretability, and trustworthiness in decision support systems across domains.
Subject: Explainable AI, Trustworthy AI

Title: BayesianVLA: Bayesian Decomposition of Vision Language Action Models via Latent
Abstract: Introduces a Bayesian framework to improve robustness and generalization in VLA
Subject: Vision-Language Models, Bayesian ML

Title: Review of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning (AI&ML): Challenges and  Perspectives
Abstract: Systematic review of AI and ML challenges, adoption barriers, and future directions.
Subject: AI Review, Machine Learning

Title: Emotionally Intelligent Robots: Advances in Social AI for Companion Care
Abstract: Examines emotionally intelligent robots and human emotional responses in social
Subject: Social Robotics, Human-Robot Interaction
